title: What is an API
description: API stands for Application Programming Interface. It is a set of rules and protocols that allows different software applications to communicate with each other. In essence, an API acts as an intermediary, enabling one application to request data or functionality from another application and receive a response
author: admin

title: What is the 'AI slop'
description: 'AI slop' refers to low-quality, often formulaic and repetitive, content generated by artificial intelligence, particularly in the realm of text, images, and videos. It's characterized by a lack of originality, effort, and often factual inaccuracies, and it's become increasingly prevalent online.
author: admin
